doc:
Sharon D. Clarke https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sharon_D._Clarke 0 Sharon Delores Clarke (born 12 August 1966) is an English actress and singer. Best known to television audiences for her role as Lola Griffin in the medical drama Holby City, Clarke has also played lead roles in many West End musicals, and originated the roles of the Killer Queen in We Will Rock You and Oda Mae Brown in Ghost the Musical. Sharon_Delores_Clarke ( born 12_August_1966 ) is an_English_actress_and_singer . Best known to television_audiences for her_role as Lola_Griffin in the_medical_drama_Holby_City , Clarke has_also_played lead_roles in many_West_End_musicals , and originated the_roles of the_Killer_Queen in We Will_Rock You and Oda_Mae_Brown in Ghost the_Musical .
